metadata.name: Failing Forward #1
metadata.description:
Introducing the "Fail Forward" NFT collection - where we celebrate the power of failing in extreme sports and in the wild world of NFT crypto. Our collection is not just for those who have achieved greatness, but for those who have dared to fail in their pursuit of it.

Our cheeky and inspiring collection features DEGENs from all walks of life, who have taken risks and stumbled along the way - but ultimately come out on top. From epic wipeouts on the half-pipe to botched trades on the market, we celebrate the spirit of learning from our failures and pushing forward.

But it's not just about the individual - we're committed to transforming the action sports space by shining a spotlight on diverse individuals and women who are making waves in the industry. Through our NFTs, we aim to inspire a new generation of boundary-pushing athletes and crypto enthusiasts.

So what are you waiting for, drop in, ape in, jump in, whatever the hell people are saying now a days and ride with us.
